backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles and anonymous-access vehicle tuning settings, with authorization checks only for profile operations and validation for car tuning parameters.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to a new version by adding a throttleSettings map while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of pre-written summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining light/dark theme variables and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling section routing via a carousel menu and rendering the appropriate tuning or placeholder panel.
frontend/src/components/CarTuningPanel.t: UI panel that loads, displays, and updates drive mode and tuning parameters with sliders and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBanner.tsx: Reusable error alert component that displays a message with destructive styling.
frontend/src/components/FuelInjectionPan: Panel for viewing and adjusting fuel injection settings via sliders and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/ModeSelector.tsx: Tabs-based selector for choosing a drive mode with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/OilChangePanel.t: Displays static oil condition status using a styled card.
frontend/src/components/ScooterTuningPan: Panel for loading, editing, and saving scooter tuning settings with multiple sliders.
frontend/src/components/SectionPlacehold: Generic placeholder section that shows a title, description, and unavailable feature message.
frontend/src/components/ThrottlePanel.ts: Panel for adjusting throttle sensitivity with a single slider and saving the value.
frontend/src/components/TopIconCarouselM: Horizontal icon-based menu with drag scrolling for selecting sections; includes default item list.
frontend/src/components/TuningSlider.tsx: A UI component rendering a labeled slider with formatted value display and visual indicator dots.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFuelInjectionSetti: Fetches, initializes defaults, and saves fuel injection settings with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalDragScro: Provides a ref enabling horizontal drag-to-scroll behavior for any element.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state and exposes login, logout, and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useScooterTuningConfi: Fetches, initializes defaults, and saves scooter tuning configs with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useThrottleSetting.ts: Loads and saves a numeric throttle setting with validation and optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useTuningConfig.ts: Fetches and updates car tuning configuration, including drive mode and tuning parameters.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, dark mode settings, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a helper function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for a dark futuristic UI.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, known issues, and requirements for a futuristic carâ€‘tuning demo app.
